name: Drawing Path
description:
Reflect and draw! Drawing Path is a game that aims to make you reflect in order to solve levels where you have to collect all the balls in the cup.

The goal remains simple on the surface, but the more you progress through the levels, the harder your brain will be challenged!
Two modes are available: 50 levels with drawings under gravity and 50 levels without gravity.

Will you be able to complete all levels?



Features:

■ 100 different levels!
■ 2 different game modes!
■ Variable difficulty !
■ Addictive gameplay!
■ Good music!
